translation.Message_0_Page_0: Oh you know how it is, minor very minor misunderstanding with the police around here, avoiding trouble!
translation.Message_0_Page_1: On that note:<pause> If you happen to wander by the brig one of my other good friends T.Rickster is in a bit of a pickle as well. I'd appreciate it if you can give him a hand <pause>- tell him P.Riso sent you!
